\n Test for Accounting Transaction\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
\n Test Simple view of an Accounting Transaction\n
open${base_url}/AccountingZuite_markChanged
verifyTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}
selectAndWaitselect_moduleAccounting
selectAndWaitselect_actionAdd Accounting Transaction
assertValuefield_my_source_sectionorganisation_module/my_organisation
assertValuefield_my_destination_section_title
assertValuefield_my_resourcecurrency_module/euro
assertText//span[@id=\'listbox_record_number\']2 record(s)
select//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[2]/selectlabel=2 - Fixed Assets
select//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[2]/selectlabel=3 - Stocks
type//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[4]/input10.0
type//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[5]/input20.0
clickAndWait//button[@name=\'Base_edit:method\']
assertPortalStatusMessageData Updated.
assertValuefield_my_source_sectionorganisation_module/my_organisation
assertValuefield_my_destination_section_title
assertValuefield_my_resourcecurrency_module/euro
assertValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[2]/selectaccount_module/fixed_assets
assertValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[2]/selectaccount_module/stocks
assertFloatValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[4]/input10.0
assertFloatValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[5]/input20.0
assertFloat//tr[@id=\'listbox_stat_line\']/td[4]10
assertFloat//tr[@id=\'listbox_stat_line\']/td[5]20
selectAndWaitselect_actionAdd Accounting Transaction Line
assertPortalStatusMessageAccounting Transaction Line added.
verifyTextlistbox_record_number3 record(s)
assertValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[2]/select
assertFloatValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[4]/input0.0
assertFloatValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[5]/input0.0
assertValuefield_my_source_sectionorganisation_module/my_organisation
assertValuefield_my_destination_section_title
assertValuefield_my_resourcecurrency_module/euro
assertValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[2]/selectaccount_module/fixed_assets
assertValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[2]/selectaccount_module/stocks
assertFloatValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[4]/input10.0
assertFloatValue//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[5]/input20.0
assertFloat//tr[@id=\'listbox_stat_line\']/td[4]10
assertFloat//tr[@id=\'listbox_stat_line\']/td[5]20
\n \n \n
